entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
